pages.text: 21|58|Atahpara tini curna-bicurna kare dilena murtiguloke, tadera pradhanati chara [1]; yate tara tara dike [2] phire ase.
21|59|Tara balala, ‘amadera mabudagulora prati erupa karala ke? Se niscaya'i an'yatama yalema.’
21|60|Lokera balala, ‘amara eka yubakake tadera samalocana karate sunechi; take bala haya ibarahima.’
21|61|Tara balala, ‘tahale take janasamakse upasthita kara, yate tara saksya haya [1].’
21|62|Tara balala, ‘he ibarahima! Tumi ki amadera mabudagulora prati erupa karecha?’
21|63|Tini balalena, ‘baram edera e pradhana-i to eta kareche [1], sutaram ederake jijnesa kara yadi era katha balate pare.’
21|64|Takhana tara nijera punarbibecana kare dekhala ebam eke an'yake balate lagala, ‘tomara'i to yalema.’
21|65|Tarapara tadera matha nata haye gela ebam tara balala, ‘tumi to jana'i ye, era katha bale na.’
21|66|Ibarahima balalena, ‘tabe ki tomara allahara paribarte emana kichura ‘ibadata kara ya tomadera kono upakara karate pare na ebam apakara'o karate pare na
21|67|‘dhika tomadera jan'ya ebam allahara paribarte tomara yadera ‘ibadata kara tadera jan'ya! Tabu'o ki tomara anudhabana karabe na?’
21|68|Tara balala, ‘take puriye phela, ara sahayya kara tomadera ma’budadera, tomara yadi kichu karate ca'o.’
21|69|Amara balalama, ‘he aguna! Tumi ibarahimera jan'ya sitala o nirapada haye ya'o.’
21|70|Ara tara tara ksati sadhanera iccha karechila. Kintu amara taderake'i sarbadhika ksatigrasta kare dilama.
21|71|Ebam amara take o lutake ud'dhara kare niye gelama se dese, yekhane amara kalyana rekhechi srstijagatera jan'ya [1].
21|72|Ebam amara ibarahimake dana karechilama isahaka ara atirikta puraskarasarupa iya’kubake [1] ebam pratyeke'i karechilama satkarmaparayana.
